alert.note: Alert for Black Mesa Area; Chinle Valley; Chuska Mountains and Defiance Plateau; Little Colorado River Valley in Apache County; Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County; Little Colorado River Valley in Navajo County; Marble and Glen Canyons; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas Hwy 264 Northward; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas South of Hwy 264; White Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued May 02 at 2:02PM MST until May 03 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 8 PM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...West winds 20 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40-45 mph expected. * WHERE...Northern and Northeastern Arizona from the Little Colorado River Valley north and east. * WHEN...From 11 AM to 8 PM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. In addition, winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
